title: I got 5x20 min Low priority que too OP nerf pls?
body:
Here's the story
I was chilling with my friends in a game of League,
My computer forced restart without my permission,
So I obviously left the game
The computer installed update for 5 minutes
Then it too me 5 more minutes to get the game back up
The game wasn't finished yet and after I joined back we managed to win the game
BUT, after the game I was notified that I got placed into low priority que for 5 matches
So I qued for normal to see how long the penalty was, and it turned out to be 20 Min.

I haven't left or Afk in matches for ages, this is the first time in months and it was due to an accident. I believe I shouldn't have gotten 5x20 min penalty for this, since we won anyway so leaving the match for 10 minutes didn't negatively influence anyone else.

Too OP nerf Pls??

And I would really appreciate it if you(talking to Rito) could remove this penalty from me right now since I believe I didnt deserve that and I don't want to waste 100 min just waiting.
